segments.text: I notice the warm light coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks lovely, with neat bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman is drying dishes so diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a nice dress and apron, looking proper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down, forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks excited, like he's on a treasure hunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting patiently, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems shaky; I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies look delicious; I wish I could have one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of calm and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how kids can turn a simple kitchen into an adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should check on them soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
